availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, wagon maker. Kentucky native. Married to Bethany Robards. Father of Martah E. Robards, Mary A. Robards, Sarah D. Robards, Leticia C. Robards, Ellen Robards, Georgia Ann Robards, and Virginia C. Robards. Murdered by F. M. Shrader in Calhoun, Kentucky in 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. X
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoun, p. 2.
